question.text: You have a short but essential journey to make. It is early morning and the roads are icy in places. It is very cold and snow is falling. Your tyres are making almost no sound. On turning left, the back of your vehicle slides a little to the right. Further on there is a slow-moving vehicle spreading salt on the road surface.
